00029 typedef std::map<std::string, int, stringcaseless> KeywordMap;
00030 static KeywordMap Keywords;
00031 
00032 
00033 // Internal
00034 static bool GetString(const std::string& filename, const std::string& section, const std::string& key, std::string& string, bool abs_fn = false);
00035 
00036 
00037 ///////////////////
00038 // Add a keyword to the list
00039 bool AddKeyword(const std::string& key, int value)
00040 {
00041  Keywords[key] = value;
00042  
00043  return true;
00044 }
00045 
00046 
00047 
00048 ///////////////////
00049 // Read a keyword from a file
00050 bool ReadKeyword(const std::string& filename, const std::string& section, const std::string& key, int *value, int defaultv)
00051 {
00052  std::string string;
00053  
00054  *value = defaultv;
00055  
00056  if(!GetString(filename,section,key,string))
00057   return false;
00058  
00059  // Try and find a keyword with matching keys
00060  KeywordMap::iterator f = Keywords.find(string);
00061  if(f != Keywords.end()) {
00062   //notes << filename << ":" << section << "." << key << ": " << f->first << "(" << string << ") = " << f->second << endl;
00063   *value = f->second;
00064   return true;
00065  }
00066  
00067  warnings << filename << ":" << section << "." << key << ": '" << string << "' is an unknown keyword" << endl;
00068  
00069  return false;
00070 }
00071 
00072 ///////////////////
00073 // Read a keyword from a file (bool version)
00074 bool ReadKeyword(const std::string& filename, const std::string& section, const std::string& key, bool *value, bool defaultv)
00075 {
00076  int v = defaultv ? 1 : 0;
00077  bool ret = ReadKeyword(filename, section, key, &v, defaultv ? 1 : 0);
00078  *value = v != 0;
00079  return ret;
00080 }
00081 
00082 ///////////////////
00083 // Read bit flags specified by keywords from a file
00084 bool ReadKeywordList(const std::string& filename, const std::string& section, const std::string& key, int *value, int defaultv)
00085 {
00086  std::string string;
00087  
00088  *value = defaultv;
00089  
00090  if(!GetString(filename,section,key,string))
00091   return false;
00092  
00093  std::vector<std::string> split = explode(string, ",");
00094  for (std::vector<std::string>::iterator it = split.begin(); it != split.end(); it++)  {
00095   TrimSpaces(*it);
00096   KeywordMap::iterator key = Keywords.find(*it);
00097   if (key != Keywords.end())
00098    *value |= key->second;
00099  }
00100  
00101  return true;
00102 }

00105 ///////////////////
00106 // Read an interger from a file
00107 bool ReadInteger(const std::string& filename, const std::string& section, const std::string& key, int *value, int defaultv)
00108 {
00109  std::string string;
00110  
00111  *value = defaultv;
00112  
00113  if(!GetString(filename,section,key,string))
00114   return false;
00115  
00116  *value = from_string<int>(string);
00117  
00118  return true;
00119 }

00122 ///////////////////
00123 // Read a string from a file
00124 bool ReadString(const std::string& filename, const std::string& section, const std::string& key, std::string& value, std::string defaultv, bool abs_fn)
00125 {
00126  value = defaultv;
00127  
00128  return GetString(filename,section,key,value, abs_fn);
00129  
00130  /*int result = GetString(filename,section,key,value);
00131   
00132   if (strlen(value) <= 0)
00133   strcpy(value,defaultv);
00134   
00135   return result;*/
00136 }

00140 ///////////////////
00141 // Read a float from a file
00142 bool ReadFloat(const std::string& filename, const std::string& section, const std::string& key, float *value, float defaultv)
00143 {
00144  std::string string;
00145  
00146  *value = defaultv;
00147  
00148  if(!GetString(filename,section,key,string))
00149   return false;
00150  
00151  *value = (float)atof(string);
00152  
00153  return true;
00154 }

00158 bool ReadColour(const std::string& filename, const std::string& section, const std::string& key, Color& value, const Color& defaultv) {
00159  std::string string;
00160  
00161  value = defaultv;
00162  
00163  if(!GetString(filename,section,key,string))
00164   return false;
00165  
00166  value = StrToCol(string);
00167  
00168  return true;
00169 }

00171 //////////////////
00172 // Reads an array of integers
00173 bool ReadIntArray(const std::string& filename, const std::string& section, const std::string& key, int *array, int num_items)
00174 {
00175  std::string string;
00176  
00177  if (!GetString(filename,section,key,string))
00178   return false;
00179  
00180  std::vector<std::string> arr = explode(string,",");
00181  for (register int i=0; i<MIN(num_items,(int)arr.size()); i++)
00182   array[i] = from_string<int>(arr[i]);
00183  
00184  return num_items == (int)arr.size();
00185 }

00188 
00189 ///////////////////
00190 // Read a string
00191 static bool GetString(const std::string& filename, const std::string& section, const std::string& key, std::string& string, bool abs_fn)
00192 {
00193  FILE *config = NULL;
00194  std::string Line;
00195  std::string tmpLine;
00196  std::string curSection;
00197  std::string temp;
00198  std::string curKey;
00199  size_t chardest = 0;
00200  int  Position;
00201  bool found = false;
00202  
00203  if(filename == "")
00204   return false;
00205  
00206  if(abs_fn) {
00207   config = OpenGameFile(filename.c_str(), "rt");
00208  } else
00209   config = OpenGameFile(filename,"rt");
00210  if(!config)
00211   return false;
00212  
00213  //string="";
00214  curSection="";
00215  temp="";
00216  curKey="";
00217  
00218  // Check for UTF-8 encoded file and skip the UTF-8 mark if it is
00219  unsigned char utf8mark[3] = {0,0,0};
00220  if(fread(utf8mark, sizeof(utf8mark), 1, config) == 0) {
00221   fclose(config);
00222   return false;
00223  }
00224  if (utf8mark[0] != 0xEF || utf8mark[1] != 0xBB || utf8mark[2] != 0xBF)
00225   fseek(config, 0, SEEK_SET); // Not a UTF-8 file, jump back to the beginning
00226  
00227  
00228  while(!feof(config) && !ferror(config))
00229  {
00230   // Parse the lines
00231   Line = ReadUntil(config, '\n');
00232   TrimSpaces(Line);
00233   
00234   ///////////////////
00235   // Comment, Ignore
00236   if(Line.size() == 0 || Line[0] == '#')
00237    continue;
00238   
00239   ////////////
00240   // Sections
00241   if(Line[0] == '[' && Line[Line.size()-1] == ']')
00242   {
00243    curSection = Line.substr(1);
00244    curSection.erase(curSection.size()-1);
00245    continue;
00246   }
00247   
00248   ////////
00249   // Keys
00250   chardest = Line.find('=');
00251   if(chardest != std::string::npos)
00252   {
00253    // Key
00254    Position = (int)chardest;
00255    tmpLine = Line;
00256    tmpLine.erase(Position);
00257    TrimSpaces(tmpLine);
00258    curKey = tmpLine;
00259    
00260    // Check if this is the key were looking for under the section were looking for
00261    if(stringcasecmp(curKey,key) == 0 && stringcasecmp(curSection,section) == 0)
00262    {
00263     // Get the value
00264     tmpLine = Line.substr(Position+1);
00265     TrimSpaces(tmpLine);
00266     string = tmpLine;
00267     found = true;
00268     break;
00269    }
00270    continue;
00271   }
00272  }
00273  
00274  fclose(config);
00275  
00276  return found;
00277 }
